replies.body:
I feel like making a list please don't hurt me
1: stimpy: no I'm not a fan but he try hard the game almost8 hours a day and he is the best.
2: oculism: stupid straight liner but the only one to tie with stimpy currently.
3: combodombo: brick beat him but brick stopped playing. Combo is actually a really good pvper and even though he sucks at soup he beat many soup gods
4: shene0509: best circle strafer I've seen in my life. Search up shene0509 on YouTube and check out one of his montages, he actually strafei against good players and succeeds.


thats for now xdxd

replies.body:
Well you know that Stimpy has been caught hacking numerous times and Oculism quit minecraft after telling everyone he cliented so...

ComboDombo used to be really good but he's crap now, i beat him.
Shene i don't have an opinion on, he only records his montages against complete and utter shitters but he still seems good against good players.

The thing is you can never claim someone to be the best player as at least 75% of MC pot/soup pvp all have client side modifications / cheats. 

On Avicus however you can narrow it down a bit.
I would honestly rate kiwi the best pvper on Avicus and actually by quite a bit.

replies.body:
Shene is fucking untouchable, I've fought him. You get within 4 blocks of him ur 5 blocks in the air flying another 5+ backwards, considering I can reduce kb greatly.

@OP: Best PvPer was Oculism before he quit, Drummer was the best before he quit. Stimpy is ofc good, but his kb is low compared to other pvpers. Grimmjow is also really good.

Rn its honestly Shene for me, could go almost even with Oculism at his (Oculism's) best and beat ImHacking with a hotbar left. Tbh the best rn could easily be Grimmjow as well.
